'''Land of Plenty's Bounds''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Land of Plenty's Bounds is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Atocpan}} after defeating {{Enemy|Hilichurl|x=4}}.
